description: Returns an array of ClusterListEntry objects of the specified length. Each ClusterListEntry object contains a cluster's state, a cluster's ID, and other important status information.

nested_items.name: ClusterListEntries
nested_items.description: Each ClusterListEntry object contains a cluster's state, a cluster's ID, and other important status information.

nested_items.name: ClusterId
nested_items.description: The 39-character ID for the cluster that you want to list, for example CID123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000.

nested_items.name: ClusterState
nested_items.description: The current state of this cluster. For information about the state of a specific node, see  JobListEntry$JobState.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The creation date for this cluster.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: Defines an optional description of the cluster, for example Environmental Data Cluster-01.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: HTTP requests are stateless. If you use the automatically generated NextToken value in your next ClusterListEntry call, your list of returned clusters will start from this point in the array.
